text: (The Trailblazer wakes up in a surreal place)
▶ ▶ But I was fighting Cocolia . Why am I here...?
▶ ▶ ...The last time I came here, I drew Nanook 's gaze. Could it be...

title: Mission Description
content: You wake up in a strange place surrounded by nebulous stars, seemingly enveloped by an amber-colored destiny.The last thing you remember is being pierced by Cocolia's lance... Could this be the afterlife? But your mind is still very clear and your body still has strength... These resounding voices in your head seem to be guiding you, telling you that you are still alive.Your companions might still be in fierce combat with Cocolia. You have to find a way to get back to their side, no matter what.

speaker: Gepard
line: The Commercial District has fallen. We've transfered the residents to the Outer Municipal District for the time being. The Garrison lost 26 fighters... but I...

speaker: Cocolia
line: ...Go on, Gepard.

speaker: Gepard
line: I... I'm not sure that they're dead... I saw their broken figures lingering in the Fragmentum ...

speaker: Gepard
line: What happened back there defied all reason... it was madness. Madam Guardian, if this continues...

speaker: Cocolia
line: ...I know well the consequences, Gepard. You may leave.

speaker: Voice of theStellaron
line: ...We know well the consequences.

speaker: Serval
line: ...Why do you hesitate, Cocolia? Isn't this what you've always been hoping for? Get out of this cage and take a look at the city. What is there to lose!?

speaker: Serval
line: The efforts of our predecessors... their unfinished research... we can finally see them come to fruition! Give me some soldiers and I'll locate the Stellaron and find out how to save our world—

speaker: Cocolia
line: ...You need to come to your senses, Serval.

speaker: Serval
line: Come... to my senses? What are you—

speaker: Cocolia
line: Guards! Miss Serval is tired, take her to rest.

speaker: Cocolia
line: Sequester her lab and detain the researchers — their work is illegal.

speaker: Serval
line: ...Why Cocolia... Why have you grown so cold...

speaker: Cocolia
line: Serval Landau... you were my most cherished friend.

speaker: Voice of the Stellaron
line: ...But there is no place for her in the promised new world.

speaker: Soldier
line: Madam Cocolia, the monsters are surging this way! ...It's too dangerous here!

speaker: Cocolia
line: ...Foolish, weak...

speaker: Composed Silvermane Guard
line: ...What? Madam, what are you saying?

speaker: Cocolia
line: Only I... Only I can understand. They have eyes that do not see, ears that do not hear...

speaker: Soldier
line: ...Aghhhhhhhh...!

speaker: Cocolia
line: Feast on their willful ignorance... absolve them of their stupidity and fear...

speaker: Bronya
line: Mother... I still don't understand.

speaker: Bronya
line: The Fragmentum corrosion has already spread to the Underworld . How will those below ground fend for themselves if we withdraw every guard?

speaker: Cocolia
line: The automatons will ensure their safety. The most important defensive position is here on the surface. If our lines crumble, the underground will vanish in an instant. Our defenses here must be maintained at all costs.

speaker: Cocolia
line: These are the choices we make, Bronya... As a leader, you must harbor the courage and foresight to choose.

speaker: Cocolia
line: You, me, and every Silvermane Guard in the city, all of us must carry out a higher mission. There will come a day when you must make your own choice. Do you understand?

speaker: Bronya
line: Higher mission...?

speaker: Cocolia
line: It is too early Bronya... still too early. You will understand when the time is right.

speaker: Guardians' Will
line: The city is drowning in tears... The power of the Preservation is fading.

speaker: Guardians' Will
line: We could not defy the will of the Stellaron after all...

children.speaker: Guardians' Will
children.line: Yes... But we have no right to judge.

text: This is not what Preservation would have wanted...

children.speaker: Guardians' Will
children.line: Ah, a believer, I see?

speaker: Guardians' Will
line: The Fragmentum had been expanding for the past 700 years. There is no faith nor wealth left for our successors... only despair.

speaker: Guardians' Will
line: To see the home we vowed to preserve wither away... That in itself is torture. Not to mention the haunting whisper of temptation...

speaker: Guardians' Will
line: The day will come when even the strongest of wills cannot help but give in to such influence. It is only a matter of time before the Amber Lord forsakes us.

text: Then let others carry on the will of Preservation.

speaker: Guardians' Will
line: You...

speaker: Guardians' Will
line: You are but a stranger to us. And yet you seek to bond your destiny to ours...

speaker: Guardians' Will
line: So be it. What is there to lose when so much has already been lost...

speaker: Guardians' Will
line: Touch the light of the Amber, trailblazer. See if your will can attract THEIR gaze.

children.text:
(The Trailblazer attempts to grab the flaming lance, but startles away as it surges with power, corresponding to the clash of Qlipoth's hammer. On their second attempt, the Trailblazer is able to maintain their hold on the lance, pulling it free and drawing the gaze of Qlipoth.)
(The Trailblazer awakes from the Path Space and lands on the hand of theEngine of Creation, completely healed from their previous injury and clutching the flaming lance. Their allies rush forward amazed and joyous.)

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: Haha

children.text: (The Trailblazer looks back and gives their allies a small nod before turning to point their lance at Cocolia)

children.speaker: Cocolia
children.line: No... It can't be...

children.speaker: Bronya
children.line: The will of Preservation has made its choice...

children.speaker: Cocolia
children.line: You know nothing of the plight of this world... nothing of the wait for its final end!

children.speaker: Bronya
children.line: Even if we are doomed to destruction, we will go bravely, walking hand in hand into the darkness...

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: No! That end won't come to pass while we're around!

html_content:
(Interactive tutorial)
(At the start of the Trailblazer's first turn)
A teammate is currently being locked on. Please use (Trailblazer)'s Skill
The new Skill can Taunt enemies and draw attacks from Cocolia
(At the start of the Trailblazer's second turn)
Magma Will is accumulated when (Trailblazer) is attacked
Consume 4 stacks of Magma Will to use Enhanced Basic ATK
(On the next ally's turn after Cocolia first uses Heartless Annihilator Call)
The Engine of Creation is activated. Use it to destroy Lance of the Eternal Freeze
An ally target's action can charge the Engine of Creation to unleash Preservation Creation's Wrath

text: (Before Cocolia first uses Last Choir of Genesis)

children.speaker: Cocolia
children.line: The power of the Stellaron is with me...

children.speaker: Cocolia
children.line: You are but cinders of the Old World soon to become ashes!

children.text: (Cocolia collapses in defeat, now in her normal form. Bronya runs up to her, only to be held back by Seele)

children.speaker: Bronya
children.line: Let me go — I gotta... I have to get to her!

children.speaker: Cocolia
children.line: The Stellaron...

children.speaker: Cocolia
children.line: ...promised us the future!

children.speaker: Cocolia
children.line: It will...

children.speaker: Cocolia
children.line: ...engulf everything!

children.text: (Cocolia gathers energy into her chest, causing an distorted explosion around her. Bronya escapes from Seele's grasp and runs towards Cocolia again, but is blocked by a force field.)

children.speaker: Bronya
children.line: Mother!

children.speaker: Bronya
children.line: Stop!

children.text: (In her final moments, Cocolia smiles before disintegrating into light particles. Bronya collapses to her knees.)

speaker: Seele
line: It's over...

speaker: Bronya
line: Mother... Did you wake up from that dream...?

speaker: March 7th
line: ▶ Wow... that was a tough trailblazing expedition. Dan Heng , (Trailblazer) — we made it! But, uh, what are we gonna do with the Stellaron? It's usually Mr. Yang who handles it...

speaker: Dan Heng
line: I've informed Himeko and Mr. Yang already. They'll seal the Stellaron.

speaker: March 7th
line: Nice! The crisis on this world is basically over, right?

speaker: Dan Heng
line: ...The storm still rages on.

speaker: Dan Heng
line: Now that the Stellaron is sealed, the Eternal Freeze will slowly recede. The Fragmentum won't aggressively expand anymore, but nor will it disappear. Jarilo-VI has a chance to return to life, but it will take time...

speaker: Dan Heng
line: It will depend on the efforts of the people here.

speaker: Bronya
line: Thank you... all of you.

text: Don't be too hard on yourself.

children.speaker: Bronya
children.line: ▶ Thank you (Trailblazer)... I—I'm fine. Don't worry.

text: What do you want to do now?

children.speaker: Bronya
children.line: This victory is only the beginning for Belobog .

text: Can't think of anything funny to say...

children.speaker: Bronya
children.line: Hehe, start thinking, we're going to need all the humor we can get... At least the biggest hurdle is behind us.

speaker: Bronya
line: There is still much to do... The people will have felt the effects of the Engine of Creation. There are so many questions to answer, so many truths to reveal...

speaker: Bronya
line: I don't know whether I can get the people to accept all this...

children.speaker: Bronya
children.line: Can I really do that...?

children.speaker: Bronya
children.line: Tell everyone about Mother's true motives... about a lie perpetrated for 700 years...

children.speaker: Seele
children.line: No... No, no way.

children.speaker: Bronya
children.line: You mean...

children.speaker: Bronya
children.line: ...Use a lie to conceal a lie. But if I do that, then...

children.speaker: Seele
children.line: You have to, Bronya.

speaker: Bronya
line: ...Seele?

speaker: Seele
line: I... I don't know how to explain it... but I don't think there's any other way.

speaker: Seele
line: In the Underworld, we tell the kids "things will be better tomorrow." Everyone knows it's a lie, but it gets them to sleep with some hope.

speaker: Seele
line: Can you imagine the consequences if we told the people what happened here? They'd be devastated. If we can't trust the guardians , who — or what — can we trust...?

speaker: Bronya
line: ...Mother died to preserve Belobog.

speaker: March 7th
line: ...What?

speaker: Bronya
line: The visitors from beyond the sky told her the secret of the Stellaron. She knew that Alisa Rand , the first supreme guardian, had failed to destroy it...

speaker: Bronya
line: ...and yet she decided to challenge its power — a power beyond human comprehension. Supreme Guardian Cocolia sacrificed herself to dispel the dark clouds enveloping this city.

speaker: Bronya
line: ...From here on out, that's the "truth" the world will hear. What do you think?

speaker: Seele
line: It keeps the hope of preservation alive, at least.

speaker: Dan Heng
line: It's logical... and hard to disprove.

speaker: March 7th
line: Why do we have to lie? ...I'm abstaining — I like telling the truth. But... I get what you're trying to do.

children.speaker: Bronya
children.line: ▶ Thank you for understanding, (Trailblazer).

text: A lie will always be a lie...

children.speaker: Bronya
children.line: I understand, but... I must protect those that believe in the Architects ...

text: ...Maybe we include some of the cool stuff we did?

children.speaker: Bronya
children.line: Sorry... I'll be sure to make it up to you.

speaker: Bronya
line: For many people, mother was an outstanding guardian... The whole truth will live on in my mind — all the mistakes, madness, evil, and dreams therein... I will be the one to carry that burden.

speaker: Bronya
line: Now I must take over the duties of the supreme guardian... and discard my naive fantasies.

speaker: Bronya
line: I'm sorry, Seele. Please protect this secret with me... till the end of our lives.

speaker: Seele
line: Say no more — I know what to do.

speaker: Bronya
line: Thank you.

speaker: Bronya
line: Well then, as promised, let's start rebuilding the bridge between the Overworld and the Underworld.

speaker: Bronya
line: Seele, can you tell everyone in the Underworld that the Stellaron has been sealed? Tell them the blockade will soon be over... and they'll breathe freely again soon.

speaker: Seele
line: Of course, leave it to me — Nat 's probably getting anxious about the delay.

speaker: Bronya
line: While you do that, I'll head back to the Administrative District . I need to tell Gepard... Serv— ah...

speaker: Seele
line: ...Are you okay!?

speaker: March 7th
line: What's wrong, Bronya? Do you feel sick?

speaker: Bronya
line: I'm... fine. I need to... hurry...

speaker: March 7th
line: ▶ She's exhausted! Quick, we need to think of something... (Trailblazer), help me out here!

text: Seele, take Bronya back with you.
We'll go to the Underworld and pass on the message.

speaker: Seele
line: Right... I almost forgot, you're still wanted by the guards... I might be an Underworlder, but at least I don't stand out as much as you guys.

speaker: Seele
line: That's settled then. I'll leave Nat to you. Remember to keep the secret — for Bron— No, for Belobog's sake.

speaker: March 7th
line: ▶ So, (Trailblazer), wanna tell us what happened back there? Don't think you can just reappear on the battlefield with a cool weapon in your hands and skip the story.

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: Uh... you drew the Amber Lord's gaze? Right at that moment? That's too much of a coincidence...

text: That's the second time I've sacrificed myself for you, March...

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: Um... thank you? That's not answering my question though...

text: All of a sudden, I was infused with a great and terrible power...!

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: Be serious! I really wanna know...

speaker: Dan Heng
line: ▶ (Trailblazer) probably doesn't know what happened either. This wouldn't be the first time... Something similar happened when we faced the Doomsday Beast on the space station . Remember that glance from Nanook?

speaker: Dan Heng
line: Originally, we thought it was because the Stellaron was linked to the Destruction , but now it seems to be more than that. We might need to speak with Mr. Yang to understand what's going on.

speaker: Dan Heng
line: Let's focus on the business at hand first. We shouldn't disrupt Himeko and Mr. Yang while they're dealing with the Stellaron. Let's talk once we're back on the Express .

speaker: March 7th
line: Mm, you're right, we need to finish what we started... Let's hurry up and find Natasha.

speaker: Seele
line: Are you alright? Are you hurt anywhere? Do you feel dizzy? Tired? Or...

speaker: Bronya
line: ...I don't know, Seele. I feel... cold... all over.

speaker: Seele
line: Isn't that normal? This place is freezing... *sneeze* Ugh...

speaker: Bronya
line: Let's get out of here before you catch a cold too.

speaker: Seele
line: Don't worry, I'm a tough cookie. Here, hold on to me... let's go.
